name: IT Application Manager
description:
An international pharmaceutical company that develops and sells pharmaceutical products is looking for IT Application Manager. This specialist is a partner person for Russia and CIS region leadership teams regarding IT-related activities with a main focus on a corporate IT applications.

The main responsibility of IT App Manager is to lead support of IT applications, own all NAV ERP instances on a system level as the most critical one, and technology landscapes in alignment with the Company IT strategies.

Fluent English is a must!
Deep knowledge of MS Dynamics NAV is a must!

Responsibilities:

  • Shapes on how technology solutions support the goals of the business.
  • Collaborates with IT partners to find solutions.
  • IT ownership of the regional ERP system MS Dynamics NAV used in Russia, Croatia, Romania, Greece, South Africa, Emirates.
  • IT ownership of local systems used in Russia and CIS.
  • Presents comprehensive updates to business leads, representing entire portfolio.
  • Manage respective internal and external Applications Management Support to ensure proper SLA.
  • Ownership of the Russia and CIS IT budget process.
  • Ensure compliance with IT general controls and enable IT Audit performance with no deficiencies.


Requirements:

Fluent in English (C1-C2).
3 and more years experience in IT management.
MS Dynamics NAV ERP architecture deep knowledge (development experience
preferred).
Project management skills.
Ability to work within a multi-cultural environment to achieve the best results for all.

Will be an advantage:
  • Experience in Russia Pharma Serialization.
  • Industry knowledge of Pharma business.
  • Understanding of SOX principles.
  • Knowledge of 1C Enterprise and ECM Docsvision platforms.


Working conditions:

  • Official job application.
  • Hybrid work format (office located in Moscow m. Shabolovskaya).
  • Salary + annual bonus.
  • VMI and life insurance.
  • Compensation for mobile communication.
  • Internal programs - vacation tickets compensation.
